definition: Jiang Ziya is fishing, if you want it, take the hook (idiom, refers to early sage 姜子牙 fishing with no bait and the hook above the water); to put one's head in the noose

sentences.english: In the manor the squire told them that Song Jiang, head of the liangshan Marsh, had snatched his daughter away by force.
sentences.chinese: 他們聽說莊主太公說他的女兒被梁山泊首領宋江搶走。

sentences.english: Today, I'd like to fish as Niu Taigong.
sentences.chinese: 今天我也來個牛太公釣魚。

sentences.english: In actual fact, these are all bequeathed methods of Tai Gong.
sentences.chinese: 其實這些都是來源於太公的遺法。

sentences.english: The time for Jiang to follow Zhou was after Zhou Emperor of the Shang Dynasty released Wen Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 姜太公歸周的時間應在商紂赦文王以後。

sentences.english: Gao Taigong asks Wang Tianshi ( a Sorcerer ) to vanquish this demon.
